name: davical
tagline: A CalDAV server for shared calendar management across devices
description: DAViCal is a CalDAV server that allows shared calendar management for desktop and mobile clients. Designed for personal and organizational use, it integrates with clients like Thunderbird, iOS, and Android calendar apps.

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Standard protocol for calendar synchronization. Universal compatibility

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Collaborate on schedules with teams. Coordinated planning

features.title: Personal & Organizational
features.description: Suitable for individuals and businesses. Scales with needs

features.title: Event Management
features.description: Full calendar functionality with reminders. Complete scheduling solution

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep your calendar data private. No cloud dependency
